level.text: DCHA and the housing provider shall execute a Tenant Assistance Contract consistent with the provisions of chapter 19, section 1916.
DCHA may enter into preliminary agreements with housing providers, prior to the execution of a Tenant Assistance Contract which specifies the conditions under which a contract shall be executed.
All other provisions of chapters 17, 18 and 19 of the Tenant Assistance Program shall be applicable to the extent consistent with other provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 33 DCR 4396, 4434-35 (July 25, 1986); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 4472, 4485 (June 23, 1989).
